mapper.select: select st.*, sm.major_id, scc.college_id from school_student as st left join school_class as sc on sc.class_id = st.class_id left join school_major as sm on sm.major_id = sc.major_id left join school_college as scc on scc.college_id = sm.college_id where st.stu_id = #{stuId}
select sc.class_year, count(st.stu_id) as stu_count from school_class as sc inner join school_student as st on st.class_id = sc.class_id group by sc.class_year order by sc.class_year asc

select sm.major_name as name,count(st.stu_id) as value from school_major as sm inner join school_class as sc on sc.major_id = sm.major_id inner join school_student as st on st.class_id = sc.class_id group by sm.major_id,sm.major_name order by value desc limit 5
